PHRASE.LANG: All components of the X55 “Jungle Stalker” Stealth Combat Suit work together for one purpose: To get the operative in range to utilize these deadly weapons. Optimized for effectiveness against both personnel and armored targets. [#Legal]

Tous les components de la Tenue de Combat Furtive X55 "Jungle Stalker" travaillent ensemble pour un seul but : obtenir l’opératoires dans la gamme afin d’utiliser ces armes meurtrières. Optimisé pour l'efficacité contre le personnel et les cibles armoriés. [#Legal]

All components of the X55 “Jungle Stalker” Stealth Combat Suit work together for one purpose: To get the operative in range to utilize these deadly weapons. Optimized for effectiveness against both personnel and armored targets. [#Legal]
